title: Automatically burn 1%+ of the PLANT emission rate
body:
Currently the PLANT emission rate is 0.02 PLANT/blocks, or approximately 17'568 PLANT per month.

This reward is separated between the farms, gardens and vertical gardens.

What we are proposing is to assign a % of PLANT emission that will go to be burn each first Monday of the week.

This has a similar effect than directly reducing the emission rate; however, we see two advantages:
- It keeps the emission rate stable at 0.02;
- It increases the value of our monthly burn.

The % of that burn pool will start at 1% and increase by 1% per week till it reaches 20%.

The general idea behind increasing the burn % of the token emission is to control the inflation of the PLANT token and help the token appreciate in price.

Since this is a major proposal, this proposal will be open for a week and if voted yes, will start on Monday the 2nd of August 2021 and our first burn from this burn pool on the 9th of August 2021.
author: 0x54195fd92Ce010B4273A5948A1061b40Dd944De4
